Control <http://bit.ly/1mf8ttg>. Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}}, CONTROL <http://bit.ly/1mf8ttg> is the third step in VMTurbo's four-pronged approach to perpetual virtual health.
Traditional virtual ops managers are threshold-based (vCPU, vMem, IOPS) and send alerts when the thresholds are breached. By then, it's too late. The house is on fire.
Wouldn't it be nice if the fire department arrived beforehand and unplugged your toaster? That's us. The soothsaying fire department. VMTurbo controls your infrastructure even across heterogeneous hypervisors, hardware vendors, and cloud environments.
Our Control video <http://bit.ly/1mf8ttg> in the Evaluation Resource Center walks you through maintaining your converged environment in the Optimal Operating Zone (OOZ), to ensure you're getting the most out of your VMTurbo trial.
Questions, comments, or feedback? Contact us <sales@vmturbo.com>. Unplugging your toaster, VMTurbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
